row.process:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
! Host : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_HOST#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Port : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_PORT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Username : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! WSAdmin Tool Bin Directory : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "WSAdmin Tool Bin Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Application Name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_APPLICATION_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Module Name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Module" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_MODULE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Bean : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Bean" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_BEAN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! URI : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "URI" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_URI#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Resource Reference : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Resource Reference" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_RES_REF#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Class : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Class" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_CLASS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Target Resource JNDI Name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Resource JNDI Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_TARGET_JNDI#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Advanced Options : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Advanced Options" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_ADV_OPTIONS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! logging start of execution : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!-------------------------------------------------Forming the command-------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#/wsadmin.sh" PATH=$PATH:&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#;export PATH : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION
: INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RES : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = "java -jar ""&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#itpa-tool.jar"" arb -cmd execute &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"
! Username : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -username &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Password : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_PASSWORD# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -password &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: IF &UC4RB_WAS_HOST# <> "" ! Host : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_HOST# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#," -host &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Port : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_PORT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -port &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Advanced Options : IF &UC4RB_WAS_ADV_OPTIONS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_WAS_ADV_OPTIONS#") : ENDIF
! Attach python file to prepare running : ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.STORE", "CHANGE_JNDI_NAME", T : SET &FILENAME# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#, "pck_websphere_change_jndi_name.py") : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -f ""&FILENAME#""")
: SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " ""&UC4RB_WAS_WSADMINLIB#""") : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " ""&UC4RB_WAS_UTILSLIB#""")
! Application name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_APPLICATION_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Module Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "_PREF:" : IF &UC4RB_WAS_MODULE# <> '*' : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "&UC4RB_WAS_MODULE#") : ENDIF : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Bean : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "_PREF:" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "&UC4RB_WAS_BEAN#") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! URI : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "_PREF:" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "&UC4RB_WAS_URI#") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Resource Reference : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "_PREF:" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "&UC4RB_WAS_RES_REF#") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Class : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "_PREF:" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "&UC4RB_WAS_CLASS#") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Target Resource JNDI Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_TARGET_JNDI# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! logging the command : PRINT &UC4RB_WAS_CMD#
! Invoking java binary &UC4RB_WAS_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CHANGE_JNDI_NAME ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CHANGE_JNDI_NAME ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
